root.description:
Default Gameplay Effects applied to the actor on spawn/respawn
- Deprecated: Startup Abilities, Attributes and Effects are being deprecated and redundant with new MGCAbilitySystemComponent which includes support for granting those. - If you are using the new Modular Actors introduced with 3.0.0 for 4.27, make sure to use the Ability System Component available on those actors to grant Abilities, Attributes and Effects and ignore this section.

param.name: Startup Effects
param.type: Array of Gameplay Effect Class References
Array of Gameplay Effect Class References
